text.body:
itu talaimakaṉāṟ pirivuṇarttappaṭṭa tōḻi avaṉai neruṅkik, kaḷavukālattoḻukkam eṭuttukkāṭṭalāṟ ṟeḷivupaṭa moḻintatūum poruḷatu nilaiyiṉmaiyum avaḷatu āṟṟāmaiyuṅ kūṟic celavu maṟuttatu.
pāṉmaruṇ maruppi ṉuralpurai pāvaṭi
yīrnaṟuṅ kamaḻkaṭāat tiṉampiri yorutta
lāṟukaṭi koḷḷum vēṟupulam paṭarntu
poruḷvayiṟ pirital vēṇṭu meṉṉu
maruḷil collu nīcol liṉaiyē
naṉṉar naṟunuta ṉayantaṉai nīvi
niṉṉiṟ piriyale ṉañcalōm peṉṉu
naṉṉar moḻiyu nīmoḻin taṉaiyē
avaṟṟuḷ, yāvō vāyiṉa māaṉ makaṉē
kiḻava riṉṉō reṉṉātu poruṭāṉ
paḻaviṉai maruṅkiṟ peyarpupeyar puṟaiyu
maṉṉa poruḷvayiṟ pirivōy niṉṉiṉ
ṟimaippuvarai vāḻāṇ maṭavō
ḷamaikkaviṉ koṇṭa tōḷiṇai maṟantē.
